Battle Of The Web Servers

25 Oct 1999

Network Computing is running an article on picking a Web server from a Web admin's P.O.V. They compare and rate MS IIS, Netscape Enterprise Server, and the Apache Web server from the Apache Software Foundation.

Many of the points they bring up are pretty common knowledge, but there might be something one can learn, so go read the article!
